There aren't going to be very many positions being posted because most schools do their contract renewal somewhere around spring break or earlier like in February or early March and so they post new openings in February or March.
She's applied for basically all of the positions that she would be a good fit for and are ones that she wants to apply for.
Usually what happens as far as she can tell is the hiring committee meet sometime in late March or early April figure out who they want to interview and then call those people.
So now she basically has to sit for the next month and see if anybody calls her.
So that's going to be hard.

She has pretty much the same conversation with James once a week where she's so anxious that she's like well maybe she should just drop this all together and look at other fields, like look for a different job altogether.
